name: Cyberift Arena
description:
Welcome to the Cyberift Alpha!

A few quick notes: This game is still in development. There are bugs. Currently the servers max out at 20 concurrent users so if nothing is loading, the entire game might be full. Please leave a comment if you play!

How to Play:

  • Use WASD  to move
  • Destroy enemies and other players and collect XP.
  • Use XP to level up and gain more abilities. 
  • You start with your disc ability already installed on Mouse 1
  • When you level up, press F and choose a slot to add a new ability to.
  • Good luck, programs
